summary:
Edmonton is the capital of the Canadian province Alberta and the fifth-largest city in Canada, with over 1 million residents. It's located along the North Saskatchewan River and is known as the "Gateway to the North." 

First inhabited by First Nations peoples, the area was explored by European Anthony Henday in 1754. Edmonton grew around trading posts and became a city in 1904, later becoming Alberta's capital.

Today, Edmonton is a cultural hub with festivals, the massive West Edmonton Mall, and Fort Edmonton Park, a living history museum.
title: Edmonton
